Description: Manages critical IT infrastructure and has elevated system access.

Manages critical commercial contracts and sensitive partner information.
Operates critical power systems and industrial control infrastructure.
Handles employee personal information and confidential HR data.
Handles general administrative tasks and office coordination.
Responsible for physical security of vehicles and transportation logistics.
Handles confidential legal documents and corporate compliance information.
Manages long-term investment projects and sensitive planning data.
Manages critical protection systems for the national power grid.
Oversees major infrastructure projects and sensitive contractor data.
Manages inventory and physical assets in the company stores.
Oversees financial records, handles sensitive transactions and manages accounting functions.

Manages confidential employee relations, compensation data, and HR policies.
